document.full_text: british voters punished the liberal democrats for their role in a deficit-cutting government on friday, rejecting the party's efforts to reform the electoral system and deserting it in local elections.
document.title: britons punish lib dems for coalition role
lines_and_colors: british voters punished the liberal democrats for their role in a deficit-cutting government on friday, rejecting the party's efforts to reform the electoral system and deserting it in local elections.
